Reviews.Title: Cheap price, filled with Quality!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Baris
Reviews.Content: LYNXX X2S Cellphone ReviewWhat is in the box?• Cellphone• Battery• Charger• Headset/ earphonesFeatures:• FM Radio• Calculator• Calendar• EBook• Alarm• Bluetooth• Torch/flashlight• CameraHow to set it up:• Turn it on by holding down on the button below the red FM button for a few seconds• It will start up going through the letters; L, Y, N, X, X• In put the time using the red outer ring to change the numbers, on the red outer ring you have to press up or down to change the numbers. NOTE: When I got it, it was originally in 24-hour format so you will have to change that later most likely.• Set the date, year, and day. NOTE: When I got it, the date format was in year, month, and date. You can change it to Month, day, year, or Day, month, and year if you wish.What I like about it: It has dual-sim capability [meaning that you can put two sim cards in ti] and it can work internationally. The user interface is very simple and easy to understand. The phone is light and not cumbersome in comparison to the smartphone that I previously used. When using the flashlight the light is bright enough to use in dark areas.  After using the FM radio, I was surprised primarily because it picked up of the radio station channels.  As for features, it does not have much but in this case, it has some internet capability and Bluetooth. However, I have not tested those out.  The camera is simple but not like the smart phone or iPod Touch quality.What I do not like about it:• It only has one wallpaper• It only has one ringtoneIn summary: The LYNXX-X2S cell phone is very basic. It has the necessary features that most would need. If you just need a phone that can call and text then this would be your phone.  Remember that this is NOT a smart phone. If you need a smart phone go elsewhere!

Reviews.Title: Best phone for the money
Reviews.Author: Theresa M. DeNisco
Reviews.Content: Great for young kids. Great for the boat! Great for a travel phone to slip in a local sim card and save money

Reviews.Title: Better than I hoped
Reviews.Author: sbro
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing phone for the price. I honestly was not expecting much when I purchased this phone, but it has been incredibly reliable and easy to use. It has definitely exceeded my expectations and I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great second phone for the money!
Reviews.Author: GJA
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a secondary phone mostly because of the price but I was surprised how good it works!

Reviews.Title: low quality
Reviews.Author: Geek-a-lot
Reviews.Content: All features look good on paper, but... Voice quality is so bad that I am going to return it. We placed AT&T; SIM in and it works. And that's the only good thing about it.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive with tons of features
Reviews.Author: C. Lee
Reviews.Content: I don't need a smartphone (I'm online all day and like to disconnect when I'm off of work, and wanted an inexpensive unlocked GSM phone that enabled two sim cards for travel in Europe, Canada, and the US. For $20 or so, this phone cannot be beat. It has a ton of features as well as listed (MP3, FM, flashlight, video, camera...). So far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Dont like it
Reviews.Author: book_seller012
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad, He could not use it. The battery dies every 3 hours and the screen is dull and dark.I would not recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Phone worked GREAT out of the States!!
Reviews.Author: Cruiser
Reviews.Content: This phone, in my opinion, is FANTASTIC for the price. Bought it to use while out of the country & it worked GREAT!!  And it has so many other special features. WELL worth the price!!!

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping.
Reviews.Author: Amber N. Hainer
Reviews.Content: Very light, kinda cheap, but hey for the price it works. You could either use it for your kid, or use it as an extra phone when you go out drinking so you don't lose or break your other phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for traveling
Reviews.Author: Sebastian T.
Reviews.Content: Very nice cheap little phone. I go to Germany every year and I needed a phone that had dual sim capability. This one was really cheap and works nicely. When my contract with verizon is up, I am switching to H2O which I can use on this phone.Pros:Media playerVideo playerEbook capabilityInternet browser (surprised me for a phone like this)Dual simBluetoothMicro sd card slotCons:Keyboard is a little cheapOnly two ringtones and they are crappy (I'm going to put my own ringtones on there)Camera quality is okay

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Jonathan J.
Reviews.Content: this product is has mind blowing sounds, very useful for traveling. keep up the good work, i'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: I am happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Kudirat Kikelomo Amusa
Reviews.Content: I like the phone and I gave it out as a gift to a set of twins. I will recommend it to anybody that needs it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Disappointment is a LynxxX2
Reviews.Author: Richard F.Piro
Reviews.Content: Happiness would be a lynx in plain view.  Phone didn't charge, didn't work, didn't impress me.  However, for 20 bucks one should not expect anything.  The return work with Amazon staff and their policy soothed my ruffled feathers.  Gee, you get what you pay for?  First time in more than a decade that Amazon/vendors had an unsatisfactory product...hope that is not an omen of things to come.

Reviews.Title: Poor call quality
Reviews.Author: jbrannan
Reviews.Content: I believe it has a sub-par antenna as the signal strength is not very good and the call quality is poor.  However, it was cheap and served its purpose as a temporary back up.  I would strongly advise against this phone as your primary communication device.

Reviews.Title: I had to eat the cost
Reviews.Author: Rainedear
Reviews.Content: it did not work.  I took it all the way to Uganda--let it charge up 24 hours and nothing.  No sign of life. I had to buy a another phone there.  By the time I returned and got it boxed up to return I realized it was past the limit.  Not happy.  Moral of the story: Don't wait 'til the last minute to get a travel phone and try it out before you take it overseas!

Reviews.Title: Good dual sim phone
Reviews.Author: R. Todd
Reviews.Content: I brought this phone for when I am travelling overseas and I need to use another service provider to keep me connected with happening home in Barbados where I lived. Thanks

ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Both SIMs)
Dual SIM Card Support with Dual SIM Standby; 1.52" 65K TFT Display; FM Radio; SMS Messaging; Games and Comfortable Slim Design.
MP3 Ringtones; Phonebook up to 200 entries;and Predictive Text Input.
Blueooth, Camera, Micro SD
ProductInfo.Name: Lynxx X2S Unlocked Dual SIM Quad Band Cell Phone with Bluetooth and Camera, Micro SD, MP3
